Chapter Previous Next

class gstConstraintEffect : public gstEffect

Constraint effect for PHANToM. This effect constrains the PHANToM to a point, line or plane using a spring/damper system. When this effect is started, its force effects ramp up over three seconds so that no significant forces are immediately generated.

From header file: gstConstraintEffect.h
